name: Ball Trap
description:
Dizzy yourself with non-stop moving balls!
Ball Trap is an arcade game in which you place the balls in their respective placeholders. There are five levels in this game, they are level 1 to level 5, choose the level you want to play, then the game start. There are many rectangular boxes on the screen such as blue box and red box. Many little blue balls and red balls are floating and balls can come into another box by going through a hole between the two boxes. Your mission is to place the balls in their respective placeholders. You can adjust the slider to pass the balls. If all the balls go to the corresponding position, you will get into the next level.
Keep calm and choose the right strategy to overcome all Ball Trap’s challenges!
